name: 潮音きつね
intro:
潮音きつね aka HERkomachi aka 黒猫です！

主にtechnoなどの四つ打ち系を作っています。時々他のジャンル(ブレイクコアとか電波ソングとか)も試しています。最近はハードウェアシンセに熱中しています。

ななひらForever．．．

name: Konseki Takane
intro:
Graphic Designer. Responsible for most of the visual design and also set the main visual direction for each album. Occasionally as a DJ.

Founded "DOUJiN LiFE'S CAFE", an organization for fans of doujin music, in order to promote doujin music in China.

"The most beautiful thing in the world is a girl with beast ears wearing white stockings."

name: 望月真白
intro:
Aka DJ MASHIRO (2), a DJ who loves Drummin’, Experimental sound.

Started music career w’ Doujin music, now show an interest in Denpa (galgame lol) culture.

Also works for GNG, a group about party night organization, digital magazine, radio sessions.

name: Nirotiy
intro:
Electronic Music Producer focused on HDM, Drum'n'Bass, and more.

Started production back from 2019 with my phone.

Pursue to convey emotions directly from myself or other people around me.

"Something I claim myself to be."

name: Laxeno57
intro:
Hello, I'm Laxeno57.

I'm interested in many styles of music, and I also produce a very wide variety of styles, some of which are extreme and far from each other, such as breakcore, rock and acoustic, and jazz, to name a few. I hope that my work will bring you images and aesthetics.

name: Joulez
intro:
Hi there, this is Joulez.

I'm currently the mastering engineer for Thoughost, and a producer of hardcore and other music here. I like Cities Skyline and eating good food. I believe in souls and spirits.

You might not be pronoucing my name right, but thats fine. Neither do I. May the spirit of health and fortune be with you.

name: wheatfox
intro:
This is wheatfox, an electronic music producer.

I mainly focus on genres of drum & bass, liquid funk, and jazz hip hop. also interested in game music scoring, garage music stuff, and hardware synthesizer design.

"It's funny how the music put times in perspective Add a soundtrack to your life and perfect it"
